name: CLI-Layouts
description: Dedicated subregistry for CLI/TUI layout templates, dashboards, and presets used across the NEXUSPRO terminal suite.

templates.name: Command Deck
templates.description: List-focused deck for command/search-first workflows with status rail and quick actions.

templates.name: Neural Matrix
templates.description: Dependency graph-first layout with live graph panel and detail inspector.

templates.name: Temporal Fabric
templates.description: Audit/log timeline with streaming updates and filter rail.

templates.name: Quantum Field
templates.description: Metrics-forward dashboard with gauges and mini-panels for throughput, latency, and health.
